channel.description:
[u][b]How to add a bow into server source?[/b][/u]
I started making my server source from blank , to learn some coding and I cant find how to add darkbow into my server. I need tutorial or something to make bow shoting and requiring arrows. So Im asking for help , who will help me I promise I'll rep.
